643 You're GD right posted 2 hours ago by magaMC117 52 comments award share download report block
52 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Get_Off_Big_Tech 36 points 2 hours ago They have nuclear families and strong communities. They don't need government for that. permalink award report block reply guywholikesDjtof2024 18 points 2 hours ago Nuclear power is great and good. Nuclear famililes are great and good. Nuclear is Always Best. permalink parent award report block reply SutopSutolf 12 points 1 hour ago The Amish don't need AI generated images either. permalink parent award report block reply midgetpornrocks 4 points 25 minutes ago Still amazing when you prompt AI to draw a hot chick holding a sign, the chick it draws is white. I wonder when that will change. permalink parent award report block reply Spindle-spin 0 points 1 hour ago Best we can do is more AI slop memes. All the memesmiths have gone out to pasture apparently. Remember 2016? There was video editing and decent Photoshop like it was a theatrical movie. Now we get none of that permalink parent award report block reply Get_Off_Big_Tech 5 points 2 hours ago Nuclear for clean energy and clean communities. permalink parent award report block reply Spindle-spin 2 points 1 hour ago Nothing wrong with gas and coal though. Coal can be cleaned. Families are clean. permalink parent award report block reply SavingPrivateGrace 2 points 2 hours ago Strong families, but there is a fear that controls that.  They get jobs at 14 when they complete school at the end of 8th grade.  Right after Rumspringa, 16, they contribute to being productive members of the community or they've left it and are shun forever.  Although shunning contributes to a strong family bond, it also breaks them. permalink parent award report block reply cyberrigger 1 points 51 minutes ago The Amish do a fish-ion permalink parent award report block reply dr_gonzo 12 points 2 hours ago There's a direct correlation between how much citizens of a country donate to charity and social welfare programs. So the more "free shit" a government hands out, the LESS its citizens donate to charity. And that's extremely unfortunate because the government is the worst possible entity to be handling charity.  It has no incentive whatsoever to restrict it. In fact, politicians are incentivized to get more and more people on the public dole so they can use that to get their votes. So what inevitably happens? Rampant abuse, just like we see today. That doesn't happen when charity is private and voluntary, because nobody in their right mind will just keep throwing money at someone that refuses to help themselves. Subjective judgments can be made, and they absolutely should be in the case of charity. Not to mention when it's private, the person paying the bills actually receives gratitude and they damn well deserve it. They're donating the product of their labor for your benefit instead of the benefit of their own friends and family. That fucking deserves a thank you. But when government does it, people feel entitled to the money. Christ, we even call them entitlement programs. How that term doesn't piss everyone off astounds me. permalink parent award report block reply squash1324 3 points 55 minutes ago Studies have been done, and the most generous people are Christians. permalink parent award report block reply dukeofdoorcounty 1 points 9 minutes ago When I knew my money was going to US citizens, I didn't mind donating to the local food bank.  Then they went woke and seem to only care about illegals.  Not a dime since. permalink parent award report block reply NotYourMan 2 points 2 hours ago This is the way of humans.  We have perverted it so that a few politicians can get rich. permalink parent award report block reply patrioticwinning3 1 points 1 hour ago And they are almost all farmers... permalink parent award report block reply LegendFang 15 points 2 hours ago And most of those kids know who their fathers are. permalink award report block reply MedicallyReddit 9 points 2 hours ago And they also don’t stab random people for no reason in broad daylight permalink parent award report block reply AcquittedZombieSlay -5 points 2 hours ago no just drown the husband and send the kids in the car in to the bottom of the lake to send them to god. Funny how yall like to throw around the amish but leave out the cult and communism part. permalink parent award report block reply Repentnow 1 points 15 minutes ago The Amish don't build walls to keep their people in. permalink parent award report block reply SupFrens 12 points 2 hours ago Because the Amish are all white. THAT IS WHY. White communities when left alone thrive. permalink award report block reply guywholikesDjtof2024 3 points 2 hours ago bbbbbbut muh rayyyycissmsmsmsmsmssmssmsms permalink parent award report block reply SupFrens 6 points 2 hours ago YES. permalink parent award report block reply guywholikesDjtof2024 0 points 2 hours ago Every ethnic group prioritizes their own.
